questions.quote: Jerry, come on, you're doin' okay now. You should at least take a look at this place. You shouldn't have to live like this.
Aw, I've just got to say it once, everybody else gets to say it, why can't I say it?
...and I have to tell you, it's exactly what this organisation needed.
And who were you tryin' to set up, anyway? The mechanic or the manager?
John Germaine? That is amazing. I was just talking about him upstairs with Elaine.
They're -- They're killing independent George! And they're, they're all in on it! World's are colliding!
You know it happens to everybody. It happened to Houdini. And he could get out of a trunk under water with his hands in chains! But he had a problem with that. The miracle is that it ever happens.
Wouldn't it be great if you could ask a woman what she's thinking?
That's the last thing she said to me. She wanted to go there also, but I wasn't in the mood.
Anyway, as I was lying in the puddle, I-I think I may have found a way for us to get Bonds and Griffey, and we wouldn't have to give up that much.
